column1: Art Institute of Chicago////I was reminded when I visited yesterday that the food here isn't bad
column2: but not great if you're desperate to eat. And like all cafes and eateries within a museum
column3: it is a little overpriced. Ate in the museum cafe on the east side(but not Modern Wing part) near where the fountain is outside
column4: and I didn't like how hard the soft taco shell was in one portion of it. The members only lounge that was nearby was nice too
column5: though I wish they had say
column6: complimentary pretzels. They did have complimentary Metropolis coffee
